name: Grilled Chicken Salad

description: Juicy beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and house special sauce.

description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.

description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with parmesan cheese and grilled chicken.

description: Hot and healthy vegetable soup made with seasonal veggies.

description: Traditional biryani cooked with basmati rice, chicken, and aromatic spices.

description: Spicy fish curry cooked with herbs and coconut milk.

description: Fried rice with egg, vegetables, and light soy sauce.
